definition.text: Now that you understand references, we can go deeper into Backups, and maybe even discuss the differences with Clones!

paragraphs.text: You've got some more reading to do! Please, read this page carefully and let the info sink in!
Outgoing references: They're always kept intact.
Incoming references: They're kept only when the original structure is deleted before restoring the backup.
Internal references: They remain internal, only when the original structure is deleted first.
